entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is Sam. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I bought it like two weeks ago.
Okay, I can certainly help you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your VeloFit account?
It's under [customer email address]. I want to return my VeloBand Pulse. It's not working right.
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. It looks like it was delivered on August 1st, and today is August 16th.
So? What's the problem? I want my money back. This thing is junk!
I understand your frustration. Unfortunately, our standard return window for the VeloBand Pulse is 10 days from the delivery date. As it's been 15 days, a standard refund isn't possible.
Are you kidding me? Ten days? That's ridiculous! I spent good money on this thing. I need this for my workouts! What am I supposed to do with it now? This is terrible customer service!

I apologize that our return policy is causing you frustration. While I can't offer a full refund at this time, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase amount. This would allow you to choose a different product from our range that might better suit your needs. While I cannot make a policy exception for a full refund, the store credit is the best I can do.
Store credit? I don't know... I really wanted my money back. What if nothing else works either?

I understand your hesitation. With the store credit, you could choose to purchase a different model of the VeloBand Pulse or even accessories for your current one. If the new product also doesn't meet your expectations, we will look at the return window for that second product independently. I'm confident we can find something you'll be happy with.
Okay, fine. Store credit it is then. But if the next thing I buy breaks too, I'm calling back and demanding a refund!

I understand. I've processed the store credit for the full purchase amount of the VeloBand Pulse. It should be available in your account immediately. You can use it during your next purchase on our website or at any VeloFit store.
Alright, thanks. I guess. I appreciate you at least doing *something*.
You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks for your help!
Thank you for contacting VeloFit. Have a great day!
